data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PFTAFLAG
variable.description: PFTAFLAG [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA02
variable.description: Sex (M, F) [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA05
variable.description: Volume calibration [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.description: Flow offset [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.description: Flow calibration [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA08
variable.description: Acceptability code detail for best test [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA08B
variable.description: 1 Computer started after start of expiration [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]
variable.value: Computer started after start of expiration
No flow-volume loop stored for calibration of acceptability

variable.value: No flow-volume loop stored for calibration of acceptability

variable.value: No flow-volume loop stored for calibration of acceptability

variable.description: FEV(1) over FEV(6) [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.description: Time of last calibration [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA41
variable.description: Time to best FVC (seconds). Q41 [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]

variable.name: PFTA42
variable.description: Quality code of technician (1-5). Q42 [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]
variable.value: Spirograms last at least 6 seconds, tracings reproducible, smooth with continuous transition of slope
Spirograms last at least 6 seconds, tracings reproducible but irregular
Spirograms last less than 6 seconds, tracings reproducible, smooth with continuous transition of slope
Spirograms last less than 6 seconds, tracings reproducible but irregular

variable.name: PFTA43
variable.description: Reading center quality code (computer generated) [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]
variable.value: Spirograms last at least 6 seconds, tracings reproducible, smooth with continuous transition of slope
Spirograms last at least 6 seconds, tracings reproducible but irregular
Spirograms last less than 6 seconds, tracings reproducible, smooth with continuous transition of slope
Spirograms last less than 6 seconds, tracings reproducible but irregular

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Pulmonary Function Test, exam 1]
